content: it s the internet s favorite baby hippo you can find the full blog post ** here 1 ** **note ** this pattern is a rough copy and is only my notes fleshed out it has no accompanying reference photos and has not been tested or checked for errors reproducibility and accuracy has not been established make at your own risk otherwise happy hooking smiley you re free to sell finished products you make from my patterns but copying and distributing the patterns themselves is prohibited just credit me @geekyhooker and link back to the pattern if you sell online tag me in your photos on social media i love seeing how everything turns out 1 https //geekyhooker com/the-chompiest-pork-ball/
